meanings.definition: Affected with motion sickness while traveling in an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The airsick passenger turned pale during the bumpy plane ride.
meanings.sent2: She felt airsick as soon as the plane took off.
meanings.sent3: The airsick traveler clutched the airsick bag tightly, hoping not to use it.
meanings.sent4: The turbulent flight left her feeling airsick for hours afterward.
meanings.sent5: The airsick sensation made her regret not taking motion sickness pills before the flight.

meanings.definition: Feeling ill or nauseated due to flying in an airplane.
meanings.sent1: The airsick child looked queasy as the plane ascended.
meanings.sent2: He became airsick whenever he flew long distances.
meanings.sent3: Despite feeling airsick, she managed to keep her composure during the flight.
meanings.sent4: The airsick feeling lingered even after the plane landed.
meanings.sent5: The airsick passengers groaned in unison as the plane hit turbulence.
